Glossary

difference image:

The so called difference image (shortened to diff image or diff img) is actually a misleading term, as it actually has a time dimension and refers to the difference between each frame of the input video. If for example your microscopic video has dimension w x h x t, the diff image has the dimension w x h x (t-1). It is the core feature of Neurotorch and mostly used for the detection algorithms.
